Description: Three small fragments from the body of a red pottery wine-jar (ostracon), exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with faint traces of one line of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389887) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389887)
